chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 is experiencing the following issue:

Material problem on the cellular base band and e-SIM.

Thank you for your help,

Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer has met all the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that personal data deletion has been performed.
✔ Has confirmed having the return label.
✔ Understands that they must include accessories and a proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

Dear ecomobile,

The time for repair or replacement has expired.

Please find a solution within 24 hours or we will refund this order.

Sincerely,

Armani from Back Market

Dear Backcare, 

Can I confirm if the customer had dropped the device during use? This infomration determines whether the device is still under warranty. Thank youfor your understanding and coopertion.

Regards,
KW

Dear ecomobile,

No, the phone never dropped, and you are way past the processing time.

We will refund this order.

Cordially,

Armani from Back Market
